context: Hello I am thinking of doing a movie night with friends. What would you recommend?
For friends night I always like a good mystery so we can solve it together Murder on the Orient Express (2017) is good Scream (1996) is always a classic
I have not seen this one but it looks really interesting. That one I have seen before
What kind of films were you looking to have for your friends night as far as genre?
What about a good comedy for the end?
resp: The Martian (2015) is a wonderful choice too Game Night (2018) is new a funny! and*
